Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine

Class YaegerStage

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.YaegerStage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable
public class YaegerStage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Initializable
A YaegerStage encapsulates an JavaFX Stage. It defines the window that is being used and contains the SceneCollection that contains all instances of YaegerScene that are part of the YaegerGame.

    • addScene

      protected void addScene​(int id, YaegerScene scene)
      Add a YaegerScene to the YaegerStage.
      Parameters:
      id - The number as an int that identifies the YaegerScene. By calling the method setActiveScene(int) the added YaegerScene can be set as the active one.
      scene - The YaegerScene that should be added.

    • setActiveScene

      Set the current active YaegerScene.
      Parameters:
      id - The Integer identifying the YaegerScene
